body_html: Makes sense; indeed, any expect test depending on PythonOp being side-effect free would be broken by the change you proposed. So the real problem is that we are using the DCE trick to implement tracing in this case; better to just not trace at all in this situation.
body_text: Makes sense; indeed, any expect test depending on PythonOp being side-effect free would be broken by the change you proposed. So the real problem is that we are using the DCE trick to implement tracing in this case; better to just not trace at all in this situation.
body: Makes sense; indeed, any expect test depending on PythonOp being side-effect free would be broken by the change you proposed. So the real problem is that we are using the DCE trick to implement tracing in this case; better to just not trace at all in this situation.
